entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine OutOfProcessToInProcessHostingModelSwitchWorks #55937
  • Quarantine ReaderThrowsResetExceptionOnInvalidBody #55936
  • Quarantine DynamicRoutesAreMatchedInDefinitionOrderOverPrecedence #55934
  • Quarantine MatchesConventionalRoutesInTheirBranches #55933
  • Quarantine TestingInfrastructure_RedirectHandlerFollowsStatusCode303 #55932
  • Quarantine MatchesControllerGroup #55931
  • Quarantine CacheTagHelper_AllowsVaryingByUICulture #55930
  • Quarantine CanApplyEndpointFilterToController #55929
  • Quarantine Renders_RoutingComponent #55928
  • Quarantine OrderedGroupMetadataForControllers #55927
  • Quarantine DisablingClientValidation_DisablesItForPagesAndViews #55926
  • Server Interactive Blazor Pages do not respect Sign-out with multiple browser tabs #55925
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #55922
  • Perf regression: json #55921
  • CultureInfo difference in ValueProviderFactory implementations #55920
  • Retry ConnectionCanSendAndReceiveDifferentMessageSizesWebSocketsTransport #55918
  • Update the baseline for Blazor WASM perf dashboard to .NET 8 #55917
    9.0-preview7
  • `dotnet user-secrets` environment detection faulty #55912

Closed

  • Style sheet not working after upgrade of ASP.NET Core MVC 7.0 application to 8.0 #55383
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextWithFilter #55913
  • [Blazor] Improve Blazor Server reconnect UI #55721
    9.0-preview5
  • IssuerAddress not being set in OpenidConnectHandler.HandleChallengeAsyncInternal #55774
  • Cascading App.razor component for all pages and components in Blazor #55909
  • QuickGrid collection from OnParametersSet not working with static SSR #55915
  • Perf regression: mvc #55908

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine the flakiest IIS tests #55938
    area-networking
  • Quarantine flaky MVC functional tests #55935
    area-mvc
  • Update WithOpenApi docs and scrub description IDs #55924
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Retry ConnectionCanSendAndReceiveDifferentMessageSizesWebSocketsTransport #55923
    area-infrastructure
  • Update AuthenticationSchemeProvider.cs public constructor summary punctuation #55919
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Date only and time only is not supported in blazor change detection for parameters #55914
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary pragmas #55810
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24277.1 #55900
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Fix AntiforgeryMiddlewareTest for non-US date formats #55779
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Allowing for the content type/encoding to be specified for the main Result types #55888
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
